TopicTitle: Hodo Aerospace Research & Munitions combat SSTOs for download.

Articles.Content:
Hodo Aerospace Research & Munitions, or HARM for short has gone through a minor restructuring and is now going to start to release some of their combat SSTO craft. List of mods required will be as follows.

-BDArmory

-FAR

-Procedural Wings

-RetroFuture

-MechJeb

-B9

-Tac Life Support

-BD Lightning cockpit.

Highly Suggested mods

-TAC Fuel Balancer

In order from left to right.

F/A-106 Thundergod, F-114 Falx, F/A-113 Falcata, FB-1 Pugio

F/A-106A Thundergod.

SSTO multirole twin seat fighter.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://kerbalx.com/crafts/421

F/A-113 Falcata

SSTO Multirole single seat fighter.

Edited November 26, 2014 by Hodo
Realized I forgot to add the download to the F/A-106.

HARM is proud to be testing a new cargo SSTO capable of taking 60tons into orbit with ease.

The SP-600!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Now in testing, a completely stock SSTO, aside from the BDARMORY parts, fighter.
And the F-117 Vulture. Its ugly, but its FAST!!!

F-119 Akula light fighter is now available from HARM.

F-119Akula

HARM is expanding operations to include rovers for all of your planetary scouting needs.

Crew 2

Science experiments

Cargobay packed with generators.

Brake lights! So it is road legal!!!!

Oh did we mention its STOCK PARTS!

LSR-1

LSR-1 Download!!

Edited December 12, 2014 by Hodo
The F-117 kinda reminds me of the old Brit Lightning (I forget the nomenclature) interceptor. I might get BD Armory for this!

The F-117 kinda reminds me of the old Brit Lightning (I forget the nomenclature) interceptor. I might get BD Armory for this!

It was part of the inspiration behind it, that and the F-8 Crusader.
Can you include a download for the SP-600?

Can you include a download for the SP-600?

I would but I am currently reworking the design after the .90 update. Just getting back into working things back. Now trying to get my tech level back to where it needs to be for my test program. I always build everything in my career mode to make sure all parts are compatible with the career installs.

Hopefully by the end of the week I should have time to get the design redesigned and back into service.

But in the mean time I will leave you with this picture of a current project undergoing flight trials.

Unfortunately never got around to updating the SP-600. Was hoping to remake it with the B9 Procedural wings, but unfortunately that killed the craft file and it was lost.

But since then I have been working on some new craft and smaller fighter type craft.

Like the F-136 Kukri

F-136 Download!
